short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized, never miss a beat with Tab Reminder ‚Äì your personal browsing assistant!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're anything like me, you've got a bunch of tabs open in your browser, all important stuff (ü§£), like that must-read blog, the crucial presentation, your favourite tweet, or the important financial times article.

But, let's be real ‚Äì it's a mess. All those tabs slow things down and make your browser feel like molasses.

With 'Tab Reminder', you can set reminders for each site, for whenever you need them. Close the tab without worries ‚Äì 'Tab Reminder' has your back. It'll ping me when it's time, so I can jump back in and tackle those tabs, stress-free.

 ‚ú® Features
1. Quick reminder configuration in right click.
2. Auto reminder at preconfigured interval.
2. Dashboard to view upcoming and past reminders.
